turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How are you? Doing all right, how are you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, thanks for asking how can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm at the Starbucks or I want to place an order at the Starbucks at the Concourse Hotel in Madison, Wisconsin.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And I was hoping you could help me with that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure what would you like to drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was hoping I could order a cafe latte size tall, and with almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's a tall caffe latte with almond milk from the starbucks at the concourse hotel in madison.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A little whipped cream on top, yeah. That'll be all right.
